You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesN N] > &not

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&Not;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2aec/index.htm U+02AEC].
  * `&not;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ac/index.htm U+000AC].
  * `&not` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ac/index.htm U+000AC].
